flavor_text_entries.black:
Protected by a hard shell, it spins
its body like a wheel and crashes
furiously into its enemies.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It is usually motionless, but when
attacked, it rotates at high speed and
then crashes into its opponent.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Storing energy for evolution, it sits.
But, when predators approach, it
moves to stab them with poison spikes.

flavor_text_entries.sword:
This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into
its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and
poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll
need for evolution.
